name: NOeL: Not Digital
overview: Noël Not Digital puts the player in the role of a young boy that wants to have a date for Christmas and to get that he have to find out as much as possible about the three girls- Kaho, Yuka, & Emi - using everything resource your computer has as its disposal. The game progress using different coversations (using the phone or the computer) and selecting date for each girl and depending of the choices full motion video sequences will appear and other events. The gameplay is about moving the rabbit cursor to the lower right hand corner of the screen to the command circle and click on W. Phone, which is the VDO phone. Click on Interactive to start talking to Kaho or another girl right away. During the talk mode, there is a re-sizable data window in the middle of the screen. The data which goes into this window comes from this black bar at the lower left hand corner of the screen right below the timer. As your character talks with Kaho or any other character, topic icons stream across this bar, so click on them and they will be transferred to the data window. If you want to ask her about a particular topic, just click on the topic icon from your data window. In general, the more you ask the more clues you will get. The game features japanese voice acting and lots of full motion video sequences.
